TypeSignature.Value: public class CursorWrapper : Java.Lang.Object, Android.Database.ICursor, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorWrapper extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Database.ICursor, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.ICloseable, class System.IDisposable
type CursorWrapper = class inherit Object interface ICursor interface ICloseable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Wrapper class for Cursor that delegates all calls to the actual cursor object.
